Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your kind words.  This is very hard for me since I just recently lost my Mom to stomach cancer and had to watch her hide her suffering.  She never wanted her kids to see her hurting.  She was a strong and brave woman up until her last breath.
Posts.Title: Need Information

Posts.Content: My friend was just recently diagnosed with breast cancer.  She found out today that she is at stage IV.  CT scan shows spot on her liver, but they are not saying that it is definately cancer on her liver too.  The cancer did spread to her bones and on her sternum.  What is the likely hood of her survival after chemo treatment.  Is this curable?
Posts.Title: Need Information
